text: In January 2026 the internal API service used Flask behind Gunicorn.
On February 14 2026 the team migrated the internal API from Flask to FastAPI.
In early Q1 2026 analytics queries ran on PostgreSQL.
By February 2026 analytics moved from PostgreSQL to DuckDB for local research loops.
The recommendation cache TTL is 45 minutes after the February tuning pass.
The current primary on-call for memory infra is Priya.
The February outage root cause was a stale DNS record in the failover path.
Production deploy window starts at 6:00 PM Pacific on weekdays.
